ISSUE.TITLE: Optional Automatic Purging
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Provide the ability to retain the last N builds per-repository (e.g. last 50 builds). When a new build is created the build history is pruned and older builds are deleted from the database. This will be an optional, opt-in feature, and N will be configurable.
